text:
üè¶An interesting wooden View Deck built on concrete stilts standing at the riverbank.
üè¶Its located across Raintree Residences along Punggol West Bank Park Connector.
ü™üThe View Deck at Riverside Trail offers visitor a sweeping view of the picturesque Sungei Punggol and its lush surrounding.
Quiet trail for morning or evening walks. Family friendly.

This side of the road is dead-end leading to private property entrance only. Maybe next time will extend further since there might be a development still here. Scenery is beautiful from one of the desk provided there.
Very nice view and the sunset is amazing
My first visit, nice view, best to visit early morning.
